products.name: RadioMaster Pocket
products.description: Ultra-portable gamepad style radio with folding sticks. Fits in your pocket but packs full EdgeTX power and ELRS.
products.dossier:
MISSION ROLE: COVERT OPS / BACKPACK CARRY
SYSTEM STATUS: VERIFIED

THE BRIEF: Most radios demand their own hard case and half your backpack space. The Pocket respects your logistics; it slides into a cargo pant pocket or the side sleeve of a bag, living right next to your keys. It runs EdgeTX, meaning it speaks the same language as the big radios, just with a form factor that doesn't scream "I am doing something technical."

OPERATIONAL NOTES:
ERGONOMICS: The gimbals are removable. If you have hands the size of catcher's mitts, you might cramp up after three packs. For everyone else, it’s plenty.
DURABILITY: High. It’s built like a glorious plastic brick. Throw it in the bag; it’ll be fine.

products.name: DJI O3 Air Unit
products.description: The ultimate HD digital FPV transmission system featuring a 4K/60fps camera with 155° FOV, 10km range, and latency as low as 30ms. Integrated 20GB storage with RockSteady stabilization.
products.consensusReview: The industry standard for HD FPV. Incredible image quality with onboard recording makes it essential for cinematic pilots.
products.dossier:
MISSION ROLE: HIGH-DEF SURVEILLANCE
SYSTEM STATUS: HIGH VALUE / THERMAL CRITICAL

THE BRIEF: The current gold standard for "I want to see the individual leaves on that tree I’m about to hit." It records 4K onboard, meaning you don’t need to strap a heavy GoPro to your quad. The video feed is so clear it feels like cheating.

HAZARD WARNING:
THERMAL RUNAWAY: This unit runs hotter than a stovetop. Do not power it up on the bench without a fan blowing on it, or it will shut itself down to prevent melting.
THE "GLASS" TAX: It is expensive. If you smash this, you will feel it in your soul (and your wallet).

products.name: BetaFPV Meteor75 Pro
products.description: The largest 1S whoop with 45mm tri-blade props for exceptional thrust-to-weight ratio. Features 1102 22000KV motors, Matrix 1S flight controller with G473 processor, and up to 6.5 min flight time on BT2.0 550mAh battery.
products.consensusReview: The go-to 75mm whoop for indoor and outdoor flying. Exceptional power delivery and durability for the 1S class.

products.name: DJI Avata 2
products.description: The ultimate ready-to-fly cinewhoop experience. Features 4K/60fps HDR video, RockSteady stabilization, and integrated propeller guards for safe indoor flight.
products.consensusReview: The easiest entry into FPV cinema. Incredible video quality and safety features, though locked into the DJI ecosystem.

products.name: Emax Tinyhawk III Plus
products.description: A durable and versatile micro drone built on 3K carbon fiber. Features ExpressLRS control, STM32F411 flight controller, and flexible 1S/2S operation for beginners through advanced pilots.
products.consensusReview: An excellent starter drone that can take a beating. The proprietary batteries are a downside.

products.name: GEPRC CineLog35 V2
products.description: A premium 3.5-inch cinewhoop with GPS, designed for carrying full-size action cameras. Features O3 Air Unit integration with dedicated shock-absorbing gimbal and 7075 aluminum reinforcement.
products.consensusReview: High performance cinewhoop that handles heavy cameras well. The frame is rigid and durable.

products.name: iFlight Nazgul Evoque F5 V2
products.description: The refined king of freestyle quads with enclosed side panels and strategic airflow cooling. Features BLITZ Mini F722 FC, XING2 2207 motors, and anti-spark protection with up to 190km/h top speed.
products.consensusReview: Still the king of bind-and-fly freestyle quads. Powerful, tuned well out of the box, and looks amazing.
products.dossier:
MISSION ROLE: HEAVY KINETIC / BANDO BASHER
SYSTEM STATUS: ARMORED

THE BRIEF: This is not a precision instrument for delicate cinematic flow; it is a blunt object designed to survive high-velocity arguments with concrete and steel. The frame geometry protects the camera, and the arms are thick enough to take a hit without snapping immediately. If you plan to fly inside abandoned buildings where the walls jump out at you, this is the tool.

THE REALITY: It’s heavy. It flies like a muscle car—lots of power, lots of drift, not much subtlety.

products.name: Flywoo Explorer LR 4 V2
products.description: The sub-250g long range champion. Features GOKU GN405 Nano stack, GPS with model finder, and achieves 28+ minute flight times on Li-Ion for 10km+ round trips.
products.consensusReview: Incredible flight times on Li-Ion. The GPS lock is faster on V2. Essential for mountain surfing.
products.dossier:
MISSION ROLE: LONG RANGE RECON
SYSTEM STATUS: HIGH EFFICIENCY / WIND SENSITIVE

THE BRIEF: A cheat code for physics. This rig stays under the 250g weight limit—which keeps the FAA off your back—but still manages to carry a Lithium-Ion pack for flight times that feel like a clerical error (20+ minutes). It is quiet, unassuming, and will get you to the mountain peak and back while the 5-inch quads are still changing batteries on the ground.

HAZARD WARNING: It’s light. Do not fly this into a stiff headwind unless you want to watch your drone drift into the next county. It lacks the mass to fight heavy turbulence.

products.name: Happymodel Mobula6 2024
products.description: Super light 65mm brushless whoop weighing only 17.7g. Features the lightest SE0702 28000KV motors at 1.46g each, SuperX AIO with BMI270 gyro, and integrated ELRS V3 receiver.
products.consensusReview: The fastest 65mm whoop available. Extremely agile but the frame can be fragile in hard crashes.
products.dossier:
MISSION ROLE: INDOOR AIR SUPERIORITY / TRAINER
SYSTEM STATUS: HIGH AGILITY / EXPENDABLE

THE BRIEF: This is a mosquito with a camera. It weighs less than a standard AA battery. You buy this for one reason: to learn how to fly without going bankrupt. It bounces off walls, hides under sofas, and survives crashes that would turn a 5-inch drone into confetti.

OPERATIONAL NOTES:
THE "ROOKIE" ADVANTAGE: It’s harmless. You can fly this in your living room at 2 AM while your family sleeps.
MAINTENANCE: The motors are tiny. If you wrap a single hair around the shaft, it’s grounded. Keep it clean.

products.name: BetaFPV Pavo20
products.description: A 2-inch cinewhoop designed for DJI O3 Air Unit, staying under 150g total. Features 1103 8500KV motors, COB LED strip, and 4-5 minute flight times on 3S for surprising wind resistance.
products.consensusReview: Perfect platform for the O3 unit indoors. Surprisingly quiet and smooth.

products.name: RotorRiot Skyliner MK3
products.description: Le Drib's signature cinematic freestyle frame with 213mm wheelbase. Features 100% plug-n-play MR30 connections, US-made carbon fiber, and compatibility with analog, DJI, and Fatshark HD systems.
products.consensusReview: Very smooth and locked in. The build quality is top tier, backed by RotorRiot support.

products.name: Axisflying Manta 3.5
products.description: A powerful 3.5-inch freestyle squashed-X with CNC aluminum structure and high-strength carbon. Aluminum camera plates protect HD systems, with performance rivaling larger 5" quads.
products.consensusReview: Built like a tank. Great for freestyle in tighter spaces where a 5-inch is too much.

products.name: BetaFPV Meteor65 Pro
products.description: The lightest 65mm frame that fits 35mm props for a massive power upgrade. Features 0802SE 19500KV motors, BMI270 gyro, and Bluejay ESC firmware for race-winning performance.
products.consensusReview: More power than the standard Meteor65. The 35mm props make a huge difference in cornering.

products.name: RadioMaster TX16S MKII
products.description: The gold standard full-size EdgeTX radio with 4.3" IPS touchscreen. Features V4.0 Hall gimbals, 2.2A USB-C charging, dual speakers, and multi-protocol or ELRS internal module options.
products.consensusReview: The best value full-size radio on the market. Limitless customization.

products.name: RadioMaster Boxer
products.description: Compact form factor with full-size Hall V4.0 gimbals and internal 1W ELRS module at 1000Hz. Features fabric handle, 20-hour battery life on 2S 6200mAh, and QC3.0 fast charging.
products.consensusReview: Best in class ergonomics for thumb grippers. The 1W ELRS is a game changer.

products.name: RadioMaster Zorro
products.description: Ergonomic gamepad-style radio with Hall sensor gimbals and Nano external module bay. Features 128x64 LCD, built-in USB-C charging, and EdgeTX/OpenTX compatibility.
products.consensusReview: Great feel for console gamers. Battery life is short with 18350s, recommend the external kit.

products.name: RadioMaster MT12
products.description: A surface radio for cars/boats running EdgeTX and ELRS. Finally brings open source power to surface RC.
products.consensusReview: Revolutionary for surface RC. Infinite customization and incredible range.

products.name: TBS Tango 2 Pro
products.description: The iconic gamepad radio with built-in Crossfire for 30km range. Features full-size foldable Hall gimbals, 5000mAh battery for 6-8 hours runtime, and FreedomTX open-source firmware.
products.consensusReview: Premium build quality. Crossfire is still reliable, though ELRS is catching up.

products.name: BetaFPV LiteRadio 3 Pro
products.description: An entry-level radio running actual EdgeTX with Hall gimbals and internal ELRS up to 250mW. Features 1.3" OLED, 2000mAh battery for 15 hours, and Nano module bay for expansion.
products.consensusReview: Good for the price. The screen is tiny but usable for basic setup.

products.name: FrSky Taranis X9D Plus 2019
products.description: The classic workhorse updated. New ACCESS protocol and a scroll wheel for navigation.
products.consensusReview: Still a solid radio, but feels dated compared to the TX16S.

products.name: Jumper T20S
products.description: A powerful compact radio with RDC90 sensor gimbals for ultra-smooth control.
products.consensusReview: The gimbals feel amazing. Build quality is improved over previous Jumper radios.

products.name: Radiolink AT10II
products.description: 12-channel radio with excellent interference rejection. Known for robust signal in noisy environments.
products.consensusReview: Great range and stability, but the interface is not as flexible as EdgeTX.

products.name: Flysky NV14
products.description: The 'Nirvana'. Unique ergonomic design with dual screens and Hall effect gimbals.
products.consensusReview: Love the grip or hate it. Very unique, but firmware support has been spotty.

products.name: DJI Goggles 3
products.description: The newest generation with Real View PiP for situational awareness. Features 1080p micro-OLED at 100Hz, integrated battery in headband, O4 transmission support, and 3-hour runtime.
products.consensusReview: The best image quality available. The Real View pass-through is handy.

products.name: DJI Goggles Integra
products.description: Integrated battery headband design for cable-free convenience. Dual 1080p micro-OLED screens at 100Hz with O3+ transmission delivering 30ms latency over 10km range.
products.consensusReview: Best value for DJI digital. Convenience of no cables is huge.

products.name: Walksnail Avatar Goggles X
products.description: Dual 1080p/100fps displays with modular VRX design for future-proofing. Features HDMI in/out, analog module support, built-in gyro, and adjustable +2 to -6 diopter.
products.consensusReview: A great alternative to DJI. HDMI in makes them versatile for Sims.

products.name: Fat Shark Dominator HD
products.description: Trusted Fat Shark optics with native Walksnail Avatar support. Features dual 1080p OLED displays, 46° FOV, and adjustable +2 to -6 diopter in a lightweight package.
products.consensusReview: Excellent optics. Familiar form factor for long-time pilots.

products.name: Skyzone SKY04X Pro
products.description: The pinnacle of analog goggles with 1920x1080 OLED screens and 52° FOV. Features V3.3 SteadyView diversity receiver, head tracker, and 720p/100fps HDMI input for HD system compatibility.
products.consensusReview: The best analog picture you can get. Menu navigation is superb.

products.name: Skyzone Cobra X V2
products.description: High-end box goggles with a 1280x720 LCD and SteadyView receiver. Glasses friendly.
products.consensusReview: Best box goggles on the market. Great for spectacle wearers.

products.name: Fat Shark HDO2.1
products.description: Updated OLED panels and adjustable focus. Requires a separate receiver module.
products.consensusReview: Classic premium analog choice. Requires investment in a good module like RapidFire.

products.name: HDZero Goggles
products.description: Designed for racers with fixed 3ms glass-to-glass latency. Features dual 1920x1080 90Hz OLED panels, open-source Linux OS, and three independently addressable cooling fans.
products.consensusReview: The racer's choice. Lowest latency digital system, period.

products.name: BetaFPV VR03
products.description: Entry-level box goggles with DVR recording capability and an external antenna.
products.consensusReview: Good starter set with DVR. Screen is decent for the price.

products.name: Walksnail Avatar HD Pro Kit
products.description: Dual antenna VTX with Pro camera featuring 1/1.8" Sony Starvis II sensor for exceptional night vision. Supports 1080p/120fps, Gyroflow stabilization, and 32GB onboard recording.
products.consensusReview: Amazing low light performance. Onboard recording is a huge plus.

products.name: Walksnail Avatar HD Nano Kit V3
products.description: Ultra-small VTX for 1S whoops. Replaced the 1S lite, now handles up to 5V input.
products.consensusReview: Essential for digital whoops. Runs hot, needs airflow.

products.name: HDZero Freestyle V2 Kit
products.description: Compact VTX capable of 1W output with fixed-latency transmission. Features 20x20 mounting, Nano 90 camera, and support for 720p60, 1080p30, and 540p90 modes.
products.consensusReview: Rock solid fixed latency. 1W power punches through interference.

products.name: HDZero Whoop Lite VTX
products.description: Designed for 1S whoops. Weighs only 1.5g. 25/200mW output.
products.consensusReview: Transforms flight feel of whoops. Digital clarity with analog weight.

products.name: TBS Unify Pro32 HV
products.description: High voltage analog VTX with double-decker heatsink design. Features SmartAudio control, CleanSwitch technology for interference-free channel changes, and PitMode for pit testing.
products.consensusReview: The gold standard for long range analog. Almost indestructible.

products.name: Rush Tank Solo
products.description: High power solo VTX. Heavy heat sinking for sustained high output.
products.consensusReview: Runs cooler than the Unify. Signal is extremely clean.

products.name: BetaFPV M03
products.description: Lightweight 350mW VTX perfect for whoops and toothpicks.
products.consensusReview: Good range for the size. Antenna connector is fragile.

products.name: Happymodel OVX300
products.description: OpenVTX protocol support. 300mW output in a tiny package.
products.consensusReview: Cheap and effective. SmartAudio setup is easy.

products.name: SpeedyBee TX800
products.description: 800mW max output. 20x20 mounting. IRC Tramp protocol.
products.consensusReview: Great value for high power. Metal case acts as a good heatsink.

products.name: RunCam Link
products.description: The 'Vista' unit manufactured by RunCam. Compatible with DJI FPV System.
products.consensusReview: Reliable workhorse for DJI system. Fits where an Air Unit won't.

products.name: Pinecil V2
products.description: RISC-V powered portable soldering iron with USB-C PD and DC input. Heats to operating temperature in 6 seconds with adjustable 100-400°C range and motion-activated sleep mode.
products.consensusReview: Best portable iron hands down. Heats up instantly.

products.name: ISDT 608PD
products.description: Compact USB-C PD charger for 1-6S batteries. Pocket sized.
products.consensusReview: Perfect travel charger. Requires a PD power brick.

products.name: ISDT Q6 Nano
products.description: 200W tiny charger. BattGO support and upgradeable firmware.
products.consensusReview: Crazy power for the size. Fan can be noisy.

products.name: Ethix Tool Case
products.description: Compact zipper case designed by Mr. Steele to hold essential field tools.
products.consensusReview: Keeps tools organized. Fits perfectly in backpacks.

products.name: TBS Ethix M3 Nut Driver
products.description: Smooth bearing-assisted prop tool. 8mm hex socket.
products.consensusReview: Makes prop changes satisfying. High quality feel.

products.name: Flywoo Fpv Multimeter
products.description: Pocket multimeter designed for drone builds. Check voltages and continuity easily.
products.consensusReview: Handy to have in the field bag. Small and effective.

products.name: VIFLY ShortSaver 2
products.description: Electronic fuse smoke stopper that completely cuts current on short circuit detection. Features on/off button, adjustable trip delay, and 1A/2A threshold selector with XT30/XT60 connectors.
products.consensusReview: Saved my electronics multiple times. Don't build without it.

products.name: TS101 Smart Soldering Iron
products.description: The updated classic. DC and PD input, boost mode, and custom tips.
products.consensusReview: Reliable and powerful. The boost button is great for ground pads.
products.dossier:
MISSION ROLE: FIELD SURGERY
SYSTEM STATUS: MANDATORY

THE BRIEF: If you fly FPV, you are also a part-time electrical engineer. This is your scalpel. It runs off the same LiPo batteries you use to fly, meaning you can repair a severed motor wire in the middle of a field.

WHY YOU NEED IT: Buying a drone without a soldering iron is like buying a car without a spare tire. It’s not a matter of if a wire breaks, but when. This tool turns a "day-ending crash" into a "15-minute pit stop."

products.name: VIFLY WhoopStor V3
products.description: 6-port 1S charger with storage and discharge function. Features up to 1.3A charge current, colorful LCD display, fan cooling, and supports PH2.0/BT2.0/A30 connectors.
products.consensusReview: The best 1S charger period. Saves your batteries.

products.name: iFixit Mako Driver Kit
products.description: 64-bit precision driver set with CNC aluminum handle and 150mm flex extension. Magnetic case with foam insert covers Phillips, TORX, Pentalobe, Hex, and dozens more bit types.
products.consensusReview: High quality bits that don't strip screws. Lasts forever.

products.name: Torvol Quad Pitstop Backpack Pro
products.description: The ultimate FPV pilot backpack with 30L capacity. Features expandable pitstop workspace, magnetic screw pocket, integrated rain cover, and holds 4+ quads with all accessories.
products.consensusReview: Expensive but worth it. The expandable pitstop area is genius.

products.name: Torvol Urban Carrier Backpack
products.description: Stylish everyday carry pack for freestyle pilots. Modular attachment system.
products.consensusReview: Great for urban missions. Not as big as the Pitstop but looks better.

products.name: Lykus DCP-M100 Case
products.description: Waterproof hard case with DIY foam. Fits DJI Avata or various setups.
products.consensusReview: Solid protection at a good price. Foam is easy to customize.

products.name: BetaFPV Storage Case
products.description: Compact hard case for 65/75mm whoops. Includes battery tester slot.
products.consensusReview: Perfect fit for tiny whoops. Zipper is high quality.

products.name: Gemfan Vanover Gate
products.description: Pop-up race gate designed by Captain Vanover. Durable fabric.
products.consensusReview: Easy to set up. Highly visible.

products.name: CNHL Black Series 1300mAh 6S
products.description: High performance 130C LiPo battery with excellent sag resistance. V2.0 version delivers punchy discharge for faster throttle response and better flight stability.
products.consensusReview: Best bang for buck battery. Punches way above its price.

products.name: Tattu R-Line V5.0 1400mAh 6S
products.description: Professional racing battery. 150C discharge rate.
products.consensusReview: The top tier choice. Power delivery is instant and sustained.

products.name: GNB 450mAh 1S
products.description: High voltage 1S battery with A30 header. Lightweight.
products.consensusReview: Great flight times for 75mm whoops. A30 connector is solid.

products.name: VIBES FPV Earbuds
products.description: Earbuds designed for hearing motor noise. Single ear and dual ear options.
products.consensusReview: Crucial for connecting with the quad. Good isolation.

products.name: Ethix Neck Strap
products.description: Comfortable lanyard with quick release. Green and grey styling.
products.consensusReview: Super soft and comfortable. Quick release is smooth.

products.name: BETAFPV Femto Whoop Frame Kit
products.description: Ultra-lightweight frame for the smallest whoop builds. Durable visuals.

products.name: SpeedyBee Master3X Modular Frame Kit
products.description: Versatile 3-inch frame with modular arms. Great for freestyle or cinematic.
products.consensusReview: Excellent build quality for the price. Easy to work on.

products.name: TBS Source One V6 5inch Frame Kit
products.description: The community favorite open-source frame. V6 improves arm rigidity and mounting options.
products.consensusReview: Unbeatable value. The standard for entry-level freestyle.

products.name: FlyFishRC Atlas 4 LR Frame Kit
products.description: Lightweight 4-inch frame optimized for O3 Air Unit and long flight times.
products.consensusReview: Great layout for GPS and heavy batteries.

products.name: HGLRC Y6 5inch LR Frame Kit
products.description: Unique Y6 configuration for redundancy and stability in long-range flights.
products.consensusReview: A specialized frame but performs surprisingly well.

products.name: Flycolor SpeedyPizza CrustCore Stack
products.description: Reliable F7 stack with BLHeli_32 ESCs. 20x20 mounting perfect for compact builds.

products.name: Axisflying Argus ECO Stack
products.description: Budget-friendly 30x30 stack with aluminum shell for protection and heat dissipation.

products.name: Hobbywing XRotor Stack
products.description: Industry standard reliability from Hobbywing. Smooth flight performance.
products.consensusReview: Never fails. Worth the extra cost for peace of mind.

products.name: TBS Lucid Pro Stack
products.description: Innovative stack for the Lucid frame series. Compact and powerful.
products.consensusReview: High quality components as expected from TBS.

products.name: SkyStars Fly Stack
products.description: High power F7 stack with 60A AM32 ESCs. Features barometer and blackbox.
products.consensusReview: Great features for the price. AM32 is smooth.

products.name: BrotherHobby Avenger 2810 Motor
products.description: Massive 2810 stators for heavy lifting. Perfect for 7-inch cinelifters.

products.name: iFlight XING2 2207 Unibell Motor
products.description: The evolution of the popular XING series. Unibell design for durability.
products.consensusReview: Very durable bells. Great performance for freestyle.

products.name: AOS RC Supernova 1605 FPV Motor
products.description: Optimized by Chris Rosser for maximum efficiency and response.
products.consensusReview: Scientifically designed for performance. Runs cool.

products.name: AOS RC Supernova 1404 FPV Motor
products.description: High performance 1404 motor for ultralights. Best in class power-to-weight.

products.name: Lumenier 2307 JohnnyFPV V3 Pro Motor
products.description: Cinematic smoothness designed by JohnnyFPV. V3 features improved bearings.
products.consensusReview: Butter smooth. Essential for cinematic footage.

products.name: DOGCOM SBang V2 1480mAh 6S Battery
products.description: High C-rating battery for racing and freestyle. SBang signature series.
products.consensusReview: Holds voltage incredibly well under load.

products.name: DOGCOM 1480mAh 6S 150C Battery
products.description: Standard high-performance pack from DOGCOM. 150C burst rate.
products.consensusReview: Reliable power delivery. Good cycle life.

products.name: DOGCOM Ultra Series 1480mAh 6S Battery
products.description: Top of the line Ultra series. Lowest internal resistance for maximum punch.
products.consensusReview: Expensive but provides unmatched sag resistance.

products.name: RadioMaster TX16S 5000mAh Battery
products.description: Official 5000mAh Li-ion pack for TX16S. Lasts all day.
products.consensusReview: Must have for TX16S owners. Fits perfectly.

products.name: XILO 1250mAh 6S 100c Basher Battery
products.description: Affordable basher pack. Good performance for the price.

products.name: Orqa 3030 70A 3-6S BLHeli_32 4-in-1 ESC - NDAA
products.description: Get ready to take your drone’s performance to new heights with the state-of-the-art Orqa 3030 70A 3-6S BLHeli_32 4-in-1 ESC.

products.name: Orqa 3030 Lite F405 Flight Controller - NDAA
products.description: The Orqa 3030 Lite F405 Flight Controller offers high-performance features and is made in the EU with full NDAA compliance.

products.name: HGLRC Wind5 Lite V2 Drone Analog - 6S - ELRS 2.4GHz
products.description: Introducing the HGLRC Wind5 Lite V2 Drone Analog - 6S - ELRS 2.4GHz, your ultimate cutting-edge aerial companion.

products.name: TBS Lucid H7 Flight Controller
products.description: The TBS Lucid H7 FC is a powerhouse built for those who crave peak performance and adaptability in their drones.

specs.DJI FPV OSD: Compatible via any spare UART port

products.name: TBS Lucid 60A 8S AM32 4-in-1 ESC
products.description: The TBS Lucid 60A 8S AM32 4-in-1 ESC is the latest in product engineering at TBS. Built for racing and freestyle applications and developed to cater to the needs of both seasoned pilots and enthusiastic newcomers.

specs.Propellers: Up to 11"; over 7" requires good airflow

products.name: VAS 2.4GHz Victory Long Range SMA Antenna - RHCP
products.description: The VAS 2.4GHz Victory Long Range SMA Antenna is a true high-performance circularly polarized antenna that makes no compromise when it comes to performance.

products.name: BETAFPV Meteor75 Pro Drone HD w/ P1 - 1S - ELRS 2.4GHz
products.description: The cutting-edge BETAFPV Meteor75 Pro HD now integrates the P1 Air Unit HD VTX, delivering stunning 1080P@60fps live video for smooth, immersive high-definition flight.

specs.Item: Meteor75 Pro P1 Brushless Whoop Quadcopter

products.name: WalleFPV Eagle2 HD Micro FPV Frame Kit
products.description: The WalleFPV Eagle2 HD Micro FPV Frame Kit is designed to house the DJI O4 Pro unit, presenting a sharp, clear picture in a small package.

products.name: ORT Walksnail/Fatshark 5.8GHz LHCP Upgrade Antenna (Set of 4)
products.description: The ORT Walksnail/Fatshark 5.8GHz LHCP Upgrade Antenna set is a kit based on our best-selling Omni and directional antenna, providing wide beamwidth yet strong penetration.

products.name: Cosmostreamer GD1 Box for DJI Output
products.description: The Cosmostreamer GD1 Box for DJI Output is a compact, professional-grade video streaming solution that unlocks live HDMI output and network streaming from compatible DJI Goggles and DJI Fly drones.

products.name: Skyzone Steadyview X 5.8GHz Diversity FPV Goggle Receiver Module
products.description: The Skyzone Steadyview X 5.8GHz Diversity FPV Goggle Receiver Module comes with new features for a happier drone pilot experience.

specs.USB C: support firmware update or power on the RX

products.name: RadioMaster Gimbal Lubricant Set
products.description: This RadioMaster Gimbal Lubricant Set contains both lubricating oil and damping oil.

products.name: WalleFPV Eagle2 Micro FPV Drone HD w/ DJI O4 Pro
products.description: The WalleFPV Eagle2 Micro FPV Drone HD is the smallest FPV drone built specifically for the DJI O4 Pro system, weighing just 68 g for maximum agility.

products.name: CubePilot Cube Red Pro Standard Set
products.description: The Cube Red Pro Standard Set is the first in CubePilot's new line of advanced autopilot modules.

products.name: BETAFPV Femto Whoop Frame Kit
products.description: The BETAFPV Femto Whoop Frame Kit is designed for performance and durability, offering a 4% thrust increase in a compact structure.

products.name: iFlight ELRS 500mW 900MHz Receiver + 220mm Antenna
products.description: The iFlight ELRS 500mW 900MHz Receiver houses high-power telemetry inside a sleek, single-side component design.

products.name: iFlight ELRS 500mW 900MHz Receiver + 160mm Antenna
products.description: The iFlight ELRS 500mW 900MHz Receiver houses high-power telemetry inside a sleek, single-side component design.

products.name: BETAFPV Pavo20 Pro 2.2" Cinewhoop w/ DJI O4 Pro - ELRS 2.4GHz
products.description: The BETAFPV Pavo20 Pro 2.2" Cinewhoop w/ DJI O4 Pro - ELRS 2.4GHz redefines lightweight freestyle performance, offering expanded compatibility with the DJI O4 Air Unit Pro—all under 150g.

specs.Supported VTX: DJI O4 Air Unit Pro with Bracket

products.name: Menace RC PyroTRIGGER
products.description: Menace RC PyroTRIGGER — Add instant smoke to your electric models.

products.name: DOGCOM 1600mAh 6S 22.2V 180C LiPo Battery - XT60
products.description: The DOGCOM 1600mAh 6S 22.2V 180C LiPo Battery is a high-performance, high-discharge battery designed for aggressive racing and freestyle flying.

products.name: TBS Crossfire Immortal T Antenna V2
products.description: TBS has the improved signal sensitivity and durability of the Immortal T antenna. The stem has also been extended to a longer 120mm and is the perfect companion for long range pilots.

products.name: Lumenier AXII 2 5.8GHz Antenna (RHCP) (2 Pcs)
products.description: The revolutionary Lumenier AXII 5.8GHz Antenna (RHCP). A mini sized 5.8GHz FPV antenna with a 1.6dBic and near perfect axial ratio.

products.name: Ultimate FPV Bundle V2 - Fat Shark HDO Plus, rapidFIRE, + Lumenier AXII 2 Diversity Antenna Bundle
